bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LI (Nos 3601-3646)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Rea J.R., The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LI (Nos 3601-3646). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 71.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1984, 8°, xvi-150 pp. et 8 pll.

C.R. par Alain Blanchard, REG 98 (1985) p. 178. - Giuliana Foti Talamanca, Iura 35 (1984) pp. 167-174. - James G. Keenan, BASP 20 (1983) pp. 181-183. - Bärbel Kramer, CR N.S., 35 (1985) pp. 360-362. - Dominic Montserrat, Gnomon 66 (1994) pp. 273-275. - Georges Nachtergael, ChrEg 61 (1986) No. 122, pp. 340-343.
